No no no no.  I like her.

Wow. Alright. Cant wait to meet her.

Vanilla? No no no no.  Youll never guess in a million billion years youll never guess.
You were saying you chose me. There was a reason?
Andy, can you inspire? Do you have that skill set?
Can I inspire?  I dont know!.....I dont know.

column1: You can just put it down.
I asked if you wanted a cold beverage and you said â€œcoffeeâ€.

You know, weve both been into each other at different times and just never really synced up.  Now were in this weird dance.
Im afraid youve lost my interest.
If the office superstore was supposed to put us little suppliers out of business, why are we still here?
Oh, youd go someplace else.  Thats not it, thats not the answer.
Take a look at where you are, where you once worked in a dying industry, you now work at its birth.  Those superstores are terrified of us.  Anybody know why?

Let me tell you how I buy something these days.  I know what I want I go on the internet, I get the best price.  Or I dont know what I want and I go to a small store that can help me.  The era of personal service is back. You are back.  Youll find that customers will pay our higher prices and then they will thank us, and we will say to them â€œyou are welcome.â€  Andrew, I chose you for a reason. Lead these people.  Show me the best numbers this place has ever seen.  Last quarter we saw 4% growth. Double it.
Neither am I, its already done.  Hah, Im just kidding, its going to take some time.

Well I never got thanked for coming into a meeting and I always wanted to be so Im gonna thank people.
This is whats under the blanket.
These are incentives.  Its how were gonna double growth. Now, youre probably all asking yourselves â€œWell, how does this work?â€

Youre exactly right and you get a point.
How does one get a point?
Ive outlined the exact parameters in an email, so check your spam folders, but basically you do your job better, you get points. So, collect fifteen points and redeem them for this polar bear.

What if we went all the way up to five hundred points?
Thats a crazy amount of points.
I dont know, for such a crazy number Id like something pretty crazy.
Alright. For five hundred points, I will wear a dress to work.
Thats pretty good.  What about uh, for a thousand points?

Ill run naked through the parking lot with a donut on my ding-dong.  Yeah? You like that? Alright! For five thousand points, I will let you tattoo whatever you want on the stern of the old SS Bernard!

Swear to God, hope to die. Now lets get to work!

I dont know what to tell you, man.

BahI think people thought I was kidding when I said that.

and Im back. How are you sir?....I think we can squeeze a couple more golf games in, right?
